response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit you. Considering its worth, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for the next 24 hours. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you decide to proceed with the purchase. I look forward to serving you and helping you achieve your goals with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 7500}
